title: Mercedes Benz Classic Car Rally 2024 spectator guide
description: The 11th edition of the Mercedes-Benz Classic Car Rally (MBCCR) will take place on November 24 in Mumbai. This is one of Asia’s premiere classic car rallies, and it features iconic cars owned by prominent car collectors, royal families and businessmen. This year, the MBCCR will have over 75 cars with multiple classic models on display.   While entry at the Taj Lands End is by invitation only, if you're excited to witness the Mercedes-Benz Classic Car Rally 2024, you can see the iconic convoy as it cruises through the city! Explore the route and pick your favorite viewing spots to immerse yourself in the timeless charm of Mercedes-Benz Classics. Mercedes Benz Classic Car Rally 2024 time table Bandstand, Bandra: 11:15 AM - 11:30 AM Bandra Reclamation Promenade (South bound): 11:35 AM - 11:45 AM Worli Sea Face (Near Blue Sea Banquets): 11:45 AM - 11:55 AM Exciting classes at this year’s Mercedes Benz Classic Car rally 40 Years of W124 In celebration of the legendary W124 E-Class' 40th anniversary, we’re showcasing all iterations of the W124 series at the rally. Read more Bruno Sacco The late Bruno Sacco is regarded as one of the best-known designers in automotive history. In his honour, we have introduced a new class to celebrate the timeless designs of this Italian maestro. Read more Supercharged Class Mercedes-Benz pioneered the concept of supercharged road cars, and to celebrate this engineering marvel, we’re presenting a special supercharged class featuring models manufactured as early as 1930. Read more Super Limousine Class Cars with an extra long wheelbase designed for royalty and dignitaries worldwide will be featured in this exclusive class. Tribute Class This class honours cars crafted as tributes to the originals, including a 190E EVO II tribute, a W124 Hammer replica and a few more surprises. Mile Munchers Highlighting the robustness and reliability of Mercedes-Benz engineering, the "Mile Munchers" class will showcase classic Mercedes-Benz cars that have journeyed from far-flung places such as Lucknow, Rajkot, Goa and Kochi, among others. html:
The 11th Mercedes-Benz Classic Car Rally will be flagged off on Sunday, November 24, from Taj Lands End, Bandra.

The 11th edition of the Mercedes-Benz Classic Car Rally (MBCCR) will take place on November 24 in Mumbai. This is one of Asia’s premiere classic car rallies, and it features iconic cars owned by prominent car collectors, royal families and businessmen.

This year, the MBCCR will have over 75 cars with multiple classic models on display.

While entry at the Taj Lands End is by invitation only, if you're excited to witness the Mercedes-Benz Classic Car Rally 2024, you can see the iconic convoy as it cruises through the city! Explore the route and pick your favorite viewing spots to immerse yourself in the timeless charm of Mercedes-Benz Classics.

Mercedes Benz Classic Car Rally 2024 time table

Bandstand, Bandra: 11:15 AM - 11:30 AM
Bandra Reclamation Promenade (South bound): 11:35 AM - 11:45 AM
Worli Sea Face (Near Blue Sea Banquets): 11:45 AM - 11:55 AM

Exciting classes at this year’s Mercedes Benz Classic Car rally

40 Years of W124
In celebration of the legendary W124 E-Class' 40th anniversary, we’re showcasing all iterations of the W124 series at the rally. Read more

Bruno Sacco
The late Bruno Sacco is regarded as one of the best-known designers in automotive history. In his honour, we have introduced a new class to celebrate the timeless designs of this Italian maestro. Read more

Supercharged Class
Mercedes-Benz pioneered the concept of supercharged road cars, and to celebrate this engineering marvel, we’re presenting a special supercharged class featuring models manufactured as early as 1930. Read more

Super Limousine Class
Cars with an extra long wheelbase designed for royalty and dignitaries worldwide will be featured in this exclusive class.

Tribute Class
This class honours cars crafted as tributes to the originals, including a 190E EVO II tribute, a W124 Hammer replica and a few more surprises.

Mile Munchers
Highlighting the robustness and reliability of Mercedes-Benz engineering, the "Mile Munchers" class will showcase classic Mercedes-Benz cars that have journeyed from far-flung places such as Lucknow, Rajkot, Goa and Kochi, among others.
